topic.title: Making the Schema Association Explicit in the XML Instance Document

keywords.indexterm: Editing XML Documentsassociate a schema to a documentadd schema association in XML instance

body.p: The association can specify a relative file path or a URL of the schema. The advantage of relative file path is that you can configure the schema at file level instead of document type level.
Go to menu Document Schema Associate schema... or click the Associate schema toolbar button to select the schema that will be associated with the XML document. The following dialog is displayed:
The association with a DTD is added as a DOCTYPE declaration. The association with a Relax NG , Schematron or NVDL schema is added as xml-model processing instruction.
